com.bmwcarit.barefoot.spatial

Class QuadTreeIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.spatial.QuadTreeIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpatialIndex<Tuple<Integer,Double>>, Serializable

    public class QuadTreeIndex
extends Object
implements SpatialIndex<Tuple<Integer,Double>>, Serializable
    Quad-tree index implementation of SpatialIndex to store polylines (Polyline).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuadTreeIndex()
      Creates a QuadTreeIndex with default bounding box of spatially indexed region and uses SpatialOperator implementation Geography.
      QuadTreeIndex(com.esri.core.geometry.Envelope2D envelope, SpatialOperator spatial)
      Creates a QuadTreeIndex.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(int id, byte[] wkb)
      Adds a polyline (Polyline) in WKB format to spatial index with some reference identifier.
      void add(int id, com.esri.core.geometry.Polyline polyline)
      Adds a copy of a Polyline in WKB format to spatial index with some reference identifier.
      void clear()
      Clears QuadTreeIndex and removes all data.
      boolean contains(int id)
      Checks if reference identifier is contained.
      Set<Tuple<Integer,Double>> knearest(com.esri.core.geometry.Point c, int k)
      Gets k nearest objects stored in the index.
      Set<Tuple<Integer,Double>> nearest(com.esri.core.geometry.Point c)
      Gets nearest object stored in the index, which may be nevertheless multiple results if they have the same distance.
      Set<Tuple<Integer,Double>> radius(com.esri.core.geometry.Point c, double radius)
      Gets objects stored in the index that are within a certain radius or overlap a certain radius.

      • QuadTreeIndex

        public QuadTreeIndex()
        Creates a QuadTreeIndex with default bounding box of spatially indexed region and uses SpatialOperator implementation Geography.

      • QuadTreeIndex

        public QuadTreeIndex(com.esri.core.geometry.Envelope2D envelope,
                     SpatialOperator spatial)
        Creates a QuadTreeIndex.
        Parameters:
        envelope - Bounding box of spatially indexed region.
        spatial - SpatialOperator for spatial operations.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(int id,
                com.esri.core.geometry.Polyline polyline)
        Adds a copy of a Polyline in WKB format to spatial index with some reference identifier.

        Note: To store only references to geometry objects provide geometries in WKB format use add(int, byte[]).

        Parameters:
        id - Identifier reference for polyline.
        polyline - Polyline object of geometry.

      • add

        public void add(int id,
                byte[] wkb)
        Adds a polyline (Polyline) in WKB format to spatial index with some reference identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier reference for polyline.
        wkb - ByteBuffer object of geometry in WKB format.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears QuadTreeIndex and removes all data.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int id)
        Checks if reference identifier is contained.
        Parameters:
        id - Reference identifier.
        Returns:
        True if it is contained, false otherwise.

      • nearest

        public Set<Tuple<Integer,Double>> nearest(com.esri.core.geometry.Point c)
        Description copied from interface: SpatialIndex
        Gets nearest object stored in the index, which may be nevertheless multiple results if they have the same distance.
        Specified by:
        nearest in interface SpatialIndex<Tuple<Integer,Double>>
        Parameters:
        c - Point of reference for nearest search.
        Returns:
        Result set of nearest object(s), may be multiple objects if they have the same distance.

      • radius

        public Set<Tuple<Integer,Double>> radius(com.esri.core.geometry.Point c,
                                         double radius)
        Description copied from interface: SpatialIndex
        Gets objects stored in the index that are within a certain radius or overlap a certain radius.
        Specified by:
        radius in interface SpatialIndex<Tuple<Integer,Double>>
        Parameters:
        c - Center point for radius search.
        radius - Radius in meters.
        Returns:
        Result set of object(s) that are within a the given radius or overlap the radius.

      • knearest

        public Set<Tuple<Integer,Double>> knearest(com.esri.core.geometry.Point c,
                                           int k)
        Description copied from interface: SpatialIndex
        Gets k nearest objects stored in the index.
        Specified by:
        knearest in interface SpatialIndex<Tuple<Integer,Double>>
        Parameters:
        c - Point of reference for nearest search.
        k - Number of objects to be searched.
        Returns:
        Result set of nearest objects (exactly k objects).
